page.title: 09HOUSING GARDENS (CTD)
page.content: Thyme common,sage,some other herbs and some mint.At the other end of the garden there are the remains of our old garage.My dad has built the wall up and put a big barbecue in there.The other side of the wall,there is a coal bunker where we keep all our coal.Next to the coal bunker there is an oil tank where we keep all our oil.Over the barbecue there is a climber for our climbing plants .In the summer we spend most of our time outside in the garden.Beside the house there is a garage where we keep our bikes and my dad keeps some of his work things. The most common flowers are daffodil,snowdrop, tulip and primrose in spring and rose,pansy and begonia in summer.In our vegetable patch we have carrots,potatoes,onions,cabbage, beetroot,beans,cauliflower,peas and rhubarb.
